events.description:
The Children Act 1989 comes into force in England and Wales.  Every
  child has the right to protection from abuse and exploitation and the right to
  have inquiries made to safeguard their welfare.
events.source:
Mr. David Batty.
    "[Timeline: the history of child protection](https://www.theguardian.com/society/2004/apr/23/childrensservices.childprotection)"
    *[The Guardian](https://www.theguardian.com/)* 2004-04-23.  Last Viewed:
    2021-06-04.

events.description: The National Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children (NSPCC) was granted statutory powers under the Children Act 1989 to apply for care and supervision orders for children at risk.
events.source:
[Wikipedia] "[National Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to
Children]" Last Edited: 2021-11-30. Last Viewed: 2021-12-02.

[Wikipedia]: https://wikipedia.org/

[National Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children]: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/National_Society_for_the_Prevention_of_Cruelty_to_Children
